If you think you are supposed to be here, then ask your site administrator about how to get authorization.' 404 'The file you tried to reach, "{error_REQUEST_URI}", does not seem to exist. Check the spelling, or check the link that sent you here. If you really think that the file should exist, then talk to someone. Probably not your site administrator, because he or she will only laugh at you. Maybe a professional psychologist or a member of the clergy. Someone who will nod their head sympathetically when you try to explain why you thought this file should exist.' 500 'This error code means INTERNAL SERVER ERROR. However, it&squot;s really a generic code that means something like "there is a problem, but I have no idea what might have caused it." Your site administrator will probably need to check the server logs to determine what might have happened.' 'You have reached this page because an error occurred. {!# generic index.php template - weblog format !} {!set no_title TRUE!} {!# this turns off the front page title !}

Welcome to Siteframe {siteframe_version}

This is the default home page for a Siteframe-powered website. You should replace this with a home page of your own choosing, or you can modify this page to suit your needs.

Changing the home page

To edit this page, navigate to Control Panel → Maintain content templates, and click on "index".

To select another home page template, navigate to Control Panel → Extended properties, and choose another template from the drop-down menu by HOME_PAGE.

To create your own home page template:

  1. Navigate to Control Panel → Maintain content templates.
  2. Select "Create a new template."
  3. Set the template type to "Home Page" and enter any desired home page text, then press Save.
  4. Go to Control Panel → Extended properties, then choose your new template from the HOME_PAGE drop-down list.

It is recommend that you do not modify one of the existing templates, since your changes may be lost in a future software upgrade. Either use an existing template unchanged, or create a copy of an existing template to modify.

Administrative user account

During the installation process, you should have created at least one administrative user account. If you did not, you will be unable to maintain and manage this website.

To create a new administrative user, click here.

If your site already has an administrative user, you are required to login before using the Control Panel.

Configuring your site

If you're seeing this page, then you have already completed at least the first stage in your site configuration. You can also visit the Extended properties page for other configuration options.

Site Statistics

The Control Panel contains links to a number of useful reports about your site, including the numbers of unique visitors per day, lists of referrers, and the most recent visitors to your site.

Further support

More documentation is available at the Siteframe website (http://siteframe.org). In addition, there are a number of mailing lists that Siteframe administrators use to assist each other with configuring and maintaining their sites. You can find more information about these at the Siteframe website.

If you have specific problems or questions, you can contact Siteframe technical support at:

support@siteframe.org

You can submit feedback to the Siteframe development team via your Control Panel feedback page.

{!# Siteframe Macro Library ### Copyright (c)2001, Broadpool, LLC. All rights reserved. #!} {!set macro_library_version '$Id: templates.xml,v 1.13 2003/07/06 12:50:44 glen Exp $'!} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### user - generates a hyperlinked reference to a user ### syntax: ### !user N ### example: ### !user 371 #!} {!define user '{BEGIN:user $1 user$1}{user_user_name}{END:user}' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### doclink - generates a hyperlinked reference to a document ### n.b. name changed from 'document', which is an internal macro that inserts ### the entire contents of a document at the macro location ### syntax: ### !doclink N ### example: ### !doclink 132 #!} {!define doclink '{BEGIN:document $1 doc$1}{doc_title}{END:document}' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### folder - generates a hyperlinked reference to a folder ### syntax: ### !folder N ### example: ### !folder 132 #!} {!define folder '{BEGIN:folder $1 folder$1}{folder_name_display}{END:folder}' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### thumbnail - generates a clickable thumbnail ### syntax: ### !thumbnail doc_id [options] ### example: ### !thumbnail 242 'align="right"' ### if you want thumbnails to be a different size, then change ### {doc_file_150} to reference a different thumbnail size #!} {!define thumbnail '{BEGIN:document $1 thumb$1} {END:document}' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### link - generates a hyperlink ### syntax: ### !link text href ### example: ### !link 'The Contax G Pages' 'http://www.contaxg.com' #!} {!define link '$1' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### bookmark - similar to the above, but generates a named bookmark ### syntax: ### !bookmark 'name' #!} {!define bookmark '' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### icon definitions #!} {!define icon '{site_path}/images/$1.gif' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### powered_by_siteframe ### generates a link to the "Powered by Siteframe" image ### ### powered_by_siteframe_graphic ### generates a link with a graphic image #!} {!define powered_by_siteframe 'Powered by Siteframe' !} {!define powered_by_siteframe_graphic '
' !} {!# --------------------------------------------------------------------------- #!} {!set siteframe_credits 'Many thanks to the following people whose contributions helped to make this a great product: Richard Sintchak, Knut Skjaerven, Lincoln Michaud, Charez Golvalez, Vish Vishvanath, Anita Campbell, Ted Campbell, Ted Pecot, Dennis Adams, Barbara Adams, Bob Cousins, Steve Moorey, Christopher Chen, and Rich Preston • Thanks to Nikon for making great cameras • Thanks to Contax for making great cameras and for inspiring this work • Special thanks to Elam for teaching me that baseball is more important than software • Mountain Dew / Code Red • FreeBSD • SuSE Linux' !}

Your currently-active subscriptions are displayed below. From this page, you can choose to edit or remove any of your existing subscriptions.

  • To create a new subscription, navigate to the document, folder, or group you wish to subscribe to, then click on the "Subscribe" link.
  • To modify a subscription, click on the Title.
  • To delete one or more subscriptions, check the box in the Del column, then press Delete Checked Subscriptions.
{BEGIN:all_subscriptions subscr_user_id} {END:all_subscriptions}

Click the Del checkbox and press Delete Checked Subscriptions to remove one or more subscriptions. Deletion is immediate; there is no confirmation.
